short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FurAffinity Extender adds to the your browsing experience of FurAffinity.net by adding additional client-side features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FurAffinity Extender adds to the your browsing experience of FurAffinity.net by adding features such as saving files, Open Gallery in Tabs to open all images in a gallery at once, keyboard shortcuts, and more.
